Articles.Content:
The KSPCS (Kerbal Space Program Communication Sattelite) is my first sattelite made with the mechanical mouse mod pack

I think I could have made it a bit better, but tell me what you think!

Hey very nice, if you think you could have made it a bit better, then try to do it! and please post it here, I want to see it, I have been trying to put a sattelite in orbit since three months ago and up to now I couldn't accomplish that.
Nice! Now all you must do is make twenty more and place them all around every planet! >: D
